title: Exhaust not updated in summoner spell displays.
body: I just realized that {{summoner:3}}  in the summoner spell display has the updated description but, in the short clip lucian's attack speed is clearly reduced. I just wanted to bring this up because i doubt many people have noticed it and to let you know that the video could use an update for the exhaust nerf that happened a while ago.

replies.body: I don't think they gonna touch the display, after all they have "recently" like a massive overhaul of the displays, it's probably gonna be another 4 years or something like before it's updated, but for future gens and past, they can always admire how much better/op-ish old exhaust was compared to now.
